title: Can't patch
body: Whenever I try to update my league it finishes updating its gets to 100% doesn't do anything, I close it and it says it needs to update to the latest patch then I let it and it says updating 0.00 mb of 0.00 mb I then close it and open it a few times and now it just doesn't say anything its the loading bar with the LoL logo.

replies.body: It's fixed now but if anyone has an answer to stop this that'd be cool.

It was probably attempting to patch without realizing the patch had already been fully applied. If this happens again in the future, try adjusting your network settings using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network isn't blocking the patcher from working correctly.
